str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To burn up, consume entirely. From kata and kaio; to burn down, i.e. Consume wholly.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From zemia; to injure, i.e. to experience detriment.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
